title: (x) Red Stripe Beer - custom (similar to Eclat) {Mike Y}
content: Please ---anyone know this one??? ![red stripe beer logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142713im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26976.gif)

comments.content: I agree, I hunted around for a while with no success.. Too bad it's not a typeface, I sort of like it.
